description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is That One Guy with a comment about the lawsuit between cops that resulted more than $23 million in damages: ‘They hospitalized a cop, but he’s a black guy and they’re white so…’ The injuries:And he’s already secured a settlement from the city for $5 […]
title: Funniest/Most Inisightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
